Reviews.Title: good basic camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The camera operates well, easy enough to use for 8 yr old.  I was disappointed it had no video mode

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Dennis D. Burgeson
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price. Does everything my Nikon coolpix did but I still have $50 for a couple toy helicopters.

Reviews.Title: MY take on the GE RS1200 camera
Reviews.Author: Jon "birdmove"
Reviews.Content: What a bargain for an inexpensive digital camera. I had a Kodak which was a decent camera till one of the plastic pieces that hold the battery lid on broke. I needed another camera but didn't want to spend a bunch. I saw this GE camera on Amazon with no reviews at the time. I took a chance and, so far, am very happy with the unit.

Reviews.Title: Great price and delivery time.
Reviews.Author: megan bridge
Reviews.Content: It worked normally but didn't come with instructions. Great price and great delivery time. Camera was in great shape but wouldn't take pix without a memory card.

Reviews.Title: Grandaughter loves this!
Reviews.Author: John W.
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my grandaughter's 11th birthday. I wanted an easy to use first camera that would make up for the fact the Kindle she got last year for christmas had no camera. She's delighted and especially likes the video making feature!I chose this because of my satisfaction with an older model GE I'd purchaced for myself.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: dyiguy
Reviews.Content: Got the camera for my 8 year old daughter. She can use it ok. Some features are beyond her at this point, but not too complicated. Storage without memory stick is quite limited. You have to use lowest quality setting to save more than a couple. Sucks up batteries fast if you toggle back and forth between stored photos and the camera function. Probably buy stock in a battery company.

Reviews.Title: A bad experience
Reviews.Author: Lela Buck
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift.  The camera arrived with the package broken and opened and then taped up.  I checked to make sure everything was there and the batteries were missing.  The camera was all scratched up like it was used and then returned.  I didn't have enough time to send it back and reorder another before the holidays.  I just bought her another gift, and gave the camera to her on the side unwrapped.  I have not heard rather the camera works or not.  My guess, probably not.
